name: postcss-em-media-query
description: PostCSS plugin for transforming min/max-width/height media queries to ems.

scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc mocha --require esm 'test/**/*.js' $([[ $WATCH_TEST ]] && echo --watch) && nyc check-coverage
scripts.version: version-changelog CHANGELOG.md && changelog-verify CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
